data-center-disaster-recovery.title: Data Center & Disaster Recovery
data-center-disaster-recovery.description: Resilient infrastructure to keep your business running, no matter what.
data-center-disaster-recovery.overview: From Tier III/IV data center design to comprehensive business continuity planning, we ensure your critical infrastructure is protected against downtime and data loss.

sections.title: The Foundation of Digital Business
sections.content: Your data center is not just a room with servers; it is the physical embodiment of your organization's intellectual property. Sunpeak Tech approaches data center design with a 'zero-compromise' philosophy. Whether retrofitting an existing MDF or building a greenfield hyperscale facility, we adhere strictly to TIA-942 and Uptime Institute standards. We understand that in critical infrastructure, redundancy is not an expense‚Äîit is insurance.

sections.title: Precision Environmental Control
sections.content: High-density computing generates immense heat. Our cooling solutions go beyond simple air conditioning. We implement precision cooling architectures using In-Row Coolers (IRC), Cold Aisle Containment (CAC), and AI-driven environmental monitoring. By optimizing airflow dynamics, we not only prevent hotspots that damage equipment but also significantly drive down PUE (Power Usage Effectiveness), saving millions in operational costs over the facility's lifecycle.

sections.title: Power Anatomy (2N+1)
sections.content: Power failure is not an option. Our electrical designs feature full 2N+1 redundancy from the utility feed down to the rack PDU. We integrate modular UPS systems, automated transfer switches (ATS), and generator farms capable of sustaining full load indefinitely during utility blackouts. We don't just design these systems; we stress-test them, simulating catastrophic failure scenarios to ensure your automated failover logic works exactly as intended.

sections.title: Disaster Recovery as a Service (DRaaS)
sections.content: Building a robust primary site is only half the battle. Our Disaster Recovery solutions provide a safety net for the unthinkable. We design active-active and active-passive geographical replication strategies. For clients without secondary sites, our private cloud DRaaS offers a secure landing zone for your workloads, enabling RTO (Recovery Time Objective) and RPO (Recovery Point Objective) measured in minutes, not days.

noc-soc-operations.title: NOC & SOC Operations
noc-soc-operations.overview: Our state-of-the-art Network Operations Center (NOC) and Security Operations Center (SOC) provide round-the-clock surveillance of your digital assets, ensuring rapid response to incidents.

sections.title: Operational Excellence Center
sections.content: Technology is only as good as its uptime. Our specific dedication to operational resilience is manifested in our 24/7 Network Operations Center (NOC) and Security Operations Center (SOC) in Bangkok. Staffed by certified engineers (CCIE, CISSP), we provide round-the-clock surveillance of client assets. For our government clients, this means rapid incident containment and transparent reporting.

sections.title: Proactive Threat Hunting
sections.content: We don't wait for alerts to ring. Our SOC analysts actively hunt for threats within your network using behavioral analytics and global threat intelligence feeds. We identify subtle indicators of compromise (IoC) that automated tools might miss, such as lateral movement or slow data exfiltration, ensuring advanced persistent threats are neutralized before damage occurs.

sections.title: Incident Response & Forensics
sections.content: When a breach occurs, speed is everything. Our Incident Response (IR) team is ready to deploy within minutes. We follow strict chain-of-custody procedures to preserve digital evidence for potential legal proceedings. Our post-incident reports provide not just a timeline of the attack, but actionable recommendations to close gaps and prevent recurrence.

it-hardware-distribution.description: Supply of enterprise-grade servers, storage, networking gear, and workstations.
it-hardware-distribution.overview: As an authorized partner of major global vendors, we supply genuine hardware with full warranty support and competitive pricing. We don‚Äôt just ship boxes; we provide pre-sales consultation to ensure the hardware you buy matches the workload you run.

sections.title: Enterprise Compute & Storage
sections.content: From hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI) to massive object storage arrays, we architect the bedrock of your data center. We partner with Dell, HPE, and Lenovo to deliver rack, tower, and blade servers optimized for virtualization, AI training, or database workloads.

sections.title: Networking Ecosystems
sections.content: A network is only as strong as its weakest link. We distribute core switches, edge routers, and next-gen firewalls from Cisco, Aruba, and Fortinet. Our logistics team ensures timely delivery of critical components, even during global supply chain shortages.

communication-network-systems.title: Communication & Network Systems
communication-network-systems.description: Advanced networking infrastructure design and implementation.
communication-network-systems.overview: We build the nervous system of modern organizations. Our network solutions deliver high bandwidth, low latency, and rock-solid reliability. Whether connecting a campus or linking trans-continental offices, we design for redundancy and speed.

sections.title: Software-Defined Wide Area Network (SD-WAN)
sections.content: Move beyond expensive MPLS clouds. Our SD-WAN solutions intelligently route traffic based on application priority and link health. We aggregate broadband, LTE/5G, and dedicated circuits to create a resilient WAN that lowers costs while improving application performance for remote branches.

sections.title: High-Density Wireless
sections.content: In the era of mobile-first workflows, Wi-Fi is mission-critical. We design high-density wireless networks for stadiums, universities, and hospitals using Wi-Fi 6E/7 technology. Our heat-mapping surveys ensure zero dead zones and seamless roaming for thousands of concurrent devices.

optical-fiber-infrastructure.title: Optical Fiber Infrastructure
optical-fiber-infrastructure.description: High-speed FTTx and backbone fiber optic cabling solutions.
optical-fiber-infrastructure.overview: Delivering light-speed connectivity. We specialize in outside plant (OSP) and inside plant (ISP) fiber optic installation, testing, and certification. Our teams are equipped with precision fusion splicers and OTDRs to ensure every strand meets strict loss-budget requirements.

sections.title: OSP / ISP Cabling
sections.content: From underground dust banks to aerial lashing, our OSP teams handle the toughest environments. Inside the building, we manage structured cabling (ISP) with meticulous cable management and labeling. We certify every link to TIA/EIA standards, providing you with the test reports needed for warranty and compliance.

sections.title: FTTx Deployment
sections.content: We enable the gigabit society. Our Fiber-to-the-Home (FTTH) and Fiber-to-the-Building (FTTB) services cover the 'last mile' with speed and precision. We have successfully deployed passive optical networks (PON) for large residential estates and industrial parks, enabling triple-play services (Voice, Video, Data) over a single strand of glass.

civil-engineering-telecom.title: Engineering & Detail Design
civil-engineering-telecom.description: Network planning and civil design for telecom infrastructure.
civil-engineering-telecom.overview: Before the first cable is laid, our engineers map the path to success. We provide end-to-end design services for telecommunications infrastructure, combining geospatial data with structural engineering principles.

sections.title: OSP Network Design
sections.content: Using advanced GIS tools, we plan optimal routes for fiber optic networks, balancing cost-efficiency with right-of-way (ROW) compliance. We produce detailed drawings for duct banks, manholes, and aerial spans that satisfy municipal regulations and utility standards.

sections.title: Telecom Tower Engineering
sections.content: We ensure vertical assets stand tall against the elements. Our structural engineers analyze wind loads and soil conditions to design robust foundations for macro towers and monopoles. We also retrofit existing structures to support 5G massive MIMO antennas without compromising structural integrity.

information-security-management-complian.title: InfoSec Management & Compliance
information-security-management-complian.description: Strategic consulting for ISO 27001 and PDPA compliance.
information-security-management-complian.overview: We help organizations navigate the complex landscape of cybersecurity regulations. Prepare for audits and secure your data governance framework. Compliance is not just a checkbox; it is a culture we help you build.

sections.title: ISO 27001:2022 Implementation
sections.content: Our certified Lead Implementers guide you through the entire ISMS journey. We conduct gap analyses, assist in policy writing, and perform internal audits to prepare you for certification. We turn abstract controls into practical workflows that enhance security without stifling business operations.

sections.title: PDPA / GDPR Consultancy
sections.content: Data privacy is a legal imperative. We help organizations map their data flows, write privacy notices, and implement Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) procedures. Our legal-technical team ensures your data processing agreements (DPA) are robust and compliant with Thai PDPA and international GDPR standards.

software-security.title: Software Security
software-security.description: Securing applications through DevSecOps and code analysis.
software-security.overview: Integrate security into your development lifecycle. We identify vulnerabilities in code before they become exploits. Our approach shifts security 'left', fixing issues early when they are cheapest to resolve.

sections.title: DevSecOps Integration
sections.content: Security shouldn't slow down innovation. We integrate automated security testing (AST) tools directly into your CI/CD pipelines. Every commit is scanned for vulnerabilities, ensuring that only secure code makes it to production. We support Jenkins, GitLab CI, and Azure DevOps environments.

sections.title: Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT)
sections.content: Our ethical hackers test your defenses against real-world attack vectors. We perform comprehensive penetration testing on web applications (OWASP Top 10), mobile apps, and APIs. Our reports provide proof-of-concept exploits and clear remediation steps for your private developers.

smart-building-automation.title: Smart Building & Automation
smart-building-automation.description: Buildings That Think. Spaces That Adapt.
smart-building-automation.overview: A building should be more than a container for people; it should be an active participant in their productivity. Sunpeak Tech transforms inert concrete and glass into cognitive structures. By integrating disparate systems‚ÄîHVAC, lighting, access control, and elevators‚Äîonto a unified IP backbone, we create facilities that react to occupancy patterns in real-time. The result is a workplace that is safer, more comfortable, and significantly cheaper to operate.

sections.title: Integrated Building Management Systems (IBMS)
sections.content: We move beyond siloed control systems. Our Master Systems Integrators (MSI) architect unified platforms where the fire alarm speaks to the ventilation, and the access control speaks to the lighting. This convergence allows for sophisticated logic: 'When the last employee badges out, dim the lights, reduce the AC, and arm the perimeter.' This level of automation reduces energy waste by up to 30%.

sections.title: Workplace IoT & Experience
sections.content: For the modern tenant, experience is paramount. We deploy dense sensor networks measuring air quality (PM2.5, CO2), occupancy, and noise levels. This data feeds into tenant experience apps, allowing users to find available meeting rooms, adjust local temperature, or call an elevator from their smartphone. We turn the building into a user-friendly platform.

sections.title: Energy & Sustainability
sections.content: Sustainability is a board-level mandate. Our smart building solutions provide the granular data needed for ESG reporting. We monitor energy consumption at the circuit level, identify inefficiencies, and automate load-shedding during peak pricing hours. We help our clients achieve and maintain LEED, WELL, and TREES certifications through data-driven operational excellence.

research-academic-services.description: Collaborative research and technology transfer for educational institutions.
research-academic-services.overview: Bridging the gap between industry and academia. We partner with universities to develop cutting-edge technologies and curriculum. Our programs turn campuses into living labs, where students and faculty can prototype innovations on carrier-grade infrastructure.

sections.title: Smart Campus Initiatives
sections.content: A smart campus is a micro-city. We implement IoT backbones that connect dormitories, lecture halls, and research labs. From automated attendance systems using facial recognition to energy-efficient library climate control, we create an environment that fosters learning while reducing operational overhead.

content.p1: Sunpeak Tech was founded with a mission to bridge the gap between complex technology and business efficiency. We believe technology should be an enabler, not a hurdle.
content.p2: Our team of certified experts brings decades of experience in Network Systems, Cyber Security, and Software Engineering. We partner with industry leaders to deliver enterprise-grade solutions to businesses of all sizes.
content.p3: From modernizing data centers to securing critical assets and enabling smart building automation, our comprehensive portfolio ensures that we are the only technology partner you will ever need.

company-overview.title: Company Overview
company-overview.description: Built on Precision. Driven by Purpose.
company-overview.content:
Founded in the wake of the 2009 telecommunications liberalization, Sunpeak Tech emerged to fill a critical gap: the need for a local systems integrator with global engineering standards. What began as a boutique network consultancy has grown into a powerhouse of 450+ professionals. We did not grow through aggressive acquisition, but through organic capability building‚Äîmastering one domain before expanding to the next, ensuring quality never faltered during our expansion.

We are engineers first, consultants second. This DNA permeates every level of our organization, from the CEO down to our field technicians. We believe that true reliability comes from deep technical understanding, not sales brochures. This is why 70% of our staff are technical roles. We invest heavily in our 'Sunpeak Academy,' an internal training program that keeps our team certified on the latest platforms from Cisco, Microsoft, and Huawei.

Headquartered in the heart of Bangkok's new business district, our operations span the entire CLMV (Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar, Vietnam) region. We maintain forward-deployment hubs in Chiang Mai, Khon Kaen, and Songkhla to ensure rapid response times for our provincial clients. This distributed presence prevents the 'Bangkok-centric' bottleneck that plagues many competitors, allowing us to service remote infrastructure projects with the same SLA as those in the capital.

vision-mission.title: Vision & Mission
vision-mission.content:
Our Vision

"To be the most trusted technology partner for organizations building the critical infrastructure of Southeast Asia's future‚Äîwhere every system operates with precision, every network connects with purpose, and every innovation serves human progress."

Our Mission

"We engineer, integrate, and operate technology systems that governments and enterprises depend on. We design solutions that prioritize reliability over complexity, deploy teams that understand our clients' missions, and operate with transparency that builds trust over decades."

Our Values

  • Precision: We measure twice, deploy once. In critical infrastructure, there are no second chances.
  • Partnership: We succeed when our clients succeed. Every engagement is a relationship, not a project.
  • Progress: We invest in R&D, training, and talent because standing still means falling behind.
  • Accountability: We own our outcomes. When something goes wrong, we fix it first and analyze later.

government-public-sector.description: Sovereign Technology for the Public Interest.

We architect the 'GovTech' stacks that power e-service portals, national identity platforms, and inter-agency data exchanges. We understand that in the public sector, technology must serve the dual masters of innovation and inclusivity‚Äîensuring no citizen is left offline.

sections.title: National Security & Defense
sections.content: For defense and intelligence agencies, the stakes are existential. We deliver air-gapped network solutions, hardened tactical communications, and secure command centers. Our supply chain integrity program ensures that every component‚Äîfrom chip to chassis‚Äîis vetted and free from tampering. We hold the necessary security clearances to work on the nation's most sensitive projects.

sections.title: Smart Cities & Municipalities
sections.content: Urbanization demands smarter management. We partner with municipalities to deploy City Operating Systems (COS). From intelligent traffic light synchronization that reduces congestion to flood monitoring networks that warn communities of rising waters, we turn city data into actionable insights for mayors and city planners.

sections.title: Data Sovereignty & Cloud

Our hybrid architectures allow agencies to leverage the elasticity of public cloud for non-critical workloads while keeping core registries locked in secure, private data centers.

Our approach centers on the 'City Brain'‚Äîa central data platform that aggregates inputs from traffic cameras, environmental sensors, and utility meters to provide municipal leaders with real-time situational awareness.

Instead of static timers, our traffic lights 'see' the traffic flow and adjust green-light duration in real-time, reducing intersection wait times by an average of 20%. We also integrate V2X (Vehicle-to-Everything) roadside units to prepare infrastructure for autonomous public transport.

sections.title: Environmental Resilience

Our flood early-warning systems integrate weather radar data with ultrasonic water level sensors in canals, giving city managers precious hours to deploy pumps and warn citizens before disaster strikes.

sections.title: Public Safety & Security

When an accident is detected by our traffic cameras, the system automatically alerts the nearest ambulance, adjusts traffic lights to create a 'green wave' for emergency vehicles, and notifies the nearest hospital‚Äîall without human intervention.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.content:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: February 1, 2026

Sunpeak Tech ('we', 'us', or 'our') respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy informs you how we look after your personal data when you visit our website, interact with our services, or enter into a contract with us.

1. Information We Collect

We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:

  • Identity Data: Name, username, title, date of birth.
  • Contact Data: Billing address, delivery address, email address, telephone numbers.
  • Technical Data: IP address, login data, browser type and version, time zone setting, operating system.
  • Usage Data: Information about how you use our website, products, and services.

2. How We Use Your Data

We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:

  • To perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you.
  • Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.
  • To comply with a legal or regulatory obligation.

3. Data Security

We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered, or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors, and other third parties who have a business need to know.

4. Your Legal Rights

Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws (PDPA/GDPR) in relation to your personal data, including the right to request access, correction, erasure, restriction, transfer, or to object to processing.

landing.title: Professional Services
landing.description: Expertise dispatched where you need it most.
landing.overview: We don't just sell products; we solve problems. Our professional services team delivers consulting, implementation, and operational support.

consulting-assessment.title: Consulting & Assessment
consulting-assessment.overview: The most expensive mistakes in technology happen before a single cable is laid. Our Consulting & Assessment practice helps organizations define their requirements clearly before procurement. We perform brownfield site surveys, gap analyses, and feasibility studies to ensure your technology roadmap aligns with your business goals.

sections.title: System Architecture & Design
sections.content: We don't rely on 'cookie-cutter' templates. Our Solution Architects create bespoke designs tailored to your specific constraints. From heat-load calculations for data centers to RF propagation modeling for wireless networks, we use advanced simulation tools to validate our designs. Our deliverables include detailed CAD drawings, bill-of-materials, and technical specifications ready for tender.

sections.title: Cybersecurity Audits & Penetration Testing
sections.content: How secure are you, really? Our offensive security team (Red Team) simulates real-world attacks to identify vulnerabilities in your infrastructure. We conduct vulnerability assessments (VA), penetration testing (PT), and social engineering audits. The output is not just a list of bugs, but a prioritized remediation roadmap.

implementation-integration.title: Implementation & Integration
implementation-integration.overview: We ensure your new technology is installed correctly and integrates smoothly with your existing environment.

operations-managed-services.title: Operations & Managed Services
operations-managed-services.overview: Let us handle the day-to-day IT operations while you focus on your core business.

maintenance-support.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance-support.description: Ensuring longevity and performance of your assets.
maintenance-support.overview: Regular maintenance and rapid repair services to minimize downtime and extend hardware life.

system-design-engineering.title: System Design & Engineering
system-design-engineering.description: Architecting the blueprint for your digital success.
system-design-engineering.overview: Our core competency. We design complex, integrated systems that solve specific business problems. From high-level architecture to detailed schematics, we ensure every component fits perfectly.

features.title: Solution Architecture
features.desc: Holistic design of hardware and software ecosystems.

features.title: Feasibility Studies
features.desc: Technical and financial analysis of proposed projects.

landing.title: Innovation & R&D
landing.description: Pioneering the future of resilient technology.
landing.overview: Our labs are where theory meets application. We invest heavily in research to stay ahead of the curve in quantum security, AI, and smart infrastructure.

research-initiatives.title: Research Initiatives
research-initiatives.overview: We are currently focused on Quantum Cryptography, AI for Civic Infrastructure, and Green Energy Computing.

sections.title: Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC)
sections.content: As quantum computers approach practicality, traditional RSA encryption becomes vulnerable. Our R&D team is piloting lattice-based logic to secure government communications against 'Harvest Now, Decrypt Later' attacks. We are testing these protocols on private fiber links between our data centers.

sections.title: AI for Civic Resilience
sections.content: We are training Large Infrastructure Models (LIMs) to predict municipal failures. By analyzing decades of maintenance data from bridges, pipelines, and power grids, our AI models can forecast structural fatigue months in advance, shifting maintenance from reactive to predictive.

research-initiatives.content: Our research teams are working on the next generation of secure communication protocols.

technology-labs.title: Technology Labs
technology-labs.overview: Our state-of-the-art facilities allow us to prototype and stress-test new solutions before they reach the market. These sandboxes are open to our partners and clients for joint POCs.

sections.title: 5G & IoT Interoperability Lab
sections.content: Located in our Chiang Mai hub, this facility tests device compatibility across different 5G spectrum bands. We simulate high-density environments (like stadiums) to ensure IoT sensors perform reliably under RF congestion.

sections.title: Green Data Center Testbed
sections.content: We experiment with liquid immersion cooling and direct-to-chip heat dissipation. This live environment allows us to validate PUE claims from hardware vendors in the tropical Thai climate, ensuring our green energy designs are backed by empirical data.

technology-labs.content: From wind tunnels for antenna testing to faraday cages for signal analysis.

academic-collaboration.title: Academic Collaboration
academic-collaboration.overview: We believe in the power of shared knowledge. Our partnerships with top universities drive breakthrough discoveries in material science, signal processing, and AI ethics. We sponsor chairs, fund PhD research, and provide real-world datasets for academic analysis.

sections.title: Center of Excellence (CoE) Program
sections.content: We have established joint CoEs with Chulalongkorn University and KMITL. These centers focus on 6G research and smart grid algorithms. Faculty members act as scientific advisors to our engineering teams, ensuring our solutions are grounded in rigorous scientific method.

sections.title: Student Internship & Co-op
sections.content: Our 'Sunpeak Scholars' program offers 6-month intensive internships for engineering and computer science students. Interns don't fetch coffee; they write code for extensive systems and configure core routers under the mentorship of senior engineers. Over 40% of our interns join us as full-time employees.

academic-collaboration.content: Joint programs with NUS, Chulalongkorn, and MIT.

publications-insights.title: Publications & Insights
publications-insights.description: Sharing our findings with the world.
publications-insights.overview: Read our latest whitepapers and technical reports on emerging trends.
publications-insights.content: Download our annual 'State of Cyber Security' report.

landing.title: Our Projects
landing.overview: From the high-pressure environment of airport construction to the secure confines of military data centers, we have delivered in the most demanding conditions. We don't just finish projects; we optimize them, often delivering ahead of schedule and under budget through rigorous project management.

sections.title: Diverse Portfolio
sections.content: Technology needs vary by industry. Our project history reflects a mastery of diverse domains. We have wired hospitals for telemedicine, illuminated stadiums for 4K broadcasting, and hardened power plants against cyberattacks. This cross-industry pollination allows us to bring best practices from aviation security into banking, or from industrial automation into building management.

sections.title: Featured Case Study: National Rail Hub
sections.content:
Project: Grand Station Connectivity
We designed and implemented the entire IT and Telecom backbone for the region's largest transit hub. Scope included 5,000+ CCTV cameras, a 100Gbps core network, and a unified passenger information system.
Outcome: Delivered on time for the grand opening; system has maintained 100% availability since launch.

featured.title: Featured Projects
featured.description: Our flagship implementations driving global change.
featured.overview: A curated selection of our most ambitious and successful projects.

construction-smart-building.title: Smart Building & Construction
construction-smart-building.overview: Integrating IoT and BMS systems into the physical fabric of buildings to create self-regulating environments.
construction-smart-building.challenge: A 50-story mixed-use skyscraper in Bangkok consumed 30% more energy than projected and lacked centralized security management.
construction-smart-building.solution: We deployed a unified Smart Building Management System (BMS) integrating 5,000+ sensors for lighting, HVAC, and access control.
construction-smart-building.result: achieved LEED Gold certification, reduced energy costs by 25%, and improved tenant satisfaction scores by 40%.

it-digital-solutions.title: IT & Digital Solutions
it-digital-solutions.overview: Cloud migration, cybersecurity overhaul, and custom software development.
it-digital-solutions.content: Case Study: FinTech Core Banking Migration.

cyber-security.title: Cyber Security Projects
cyber-security.description: Defending critical infrastructure against modern threats.
cyber-security.overview: A showcase of our high-stakes security implementations. We have secured national data centers, financial institutions, and power grids against sophisticated cyber attacks.
cyber-security.challenge: A leading regional bank faced increasing ransomware attacks and needed a zero-trust architecture overhaul without disrupting daily operations.
cyber-security.solution: We deployed a comprehensive SOC, implemented micro-segmentation, and upgraded identity management systems across 500+ branches.
cyber-security.result: Zero successful breaches in the 24 months post-implementation, with a 40% reduction in security operational costs.

telecom-infrastructure.title: Telecom Infrastructure Projects
telecom-infrastructure.description: Connecting the nation with next-gen fiber and wireless.
telecom-infrastructure.overview: Deploying the backbone of the digital economy. Our projects span from metro fiber rings to rural 5G expansion.
telecom-infrastructure.challenge: Extend high-speed internet access to 50 remote villages in Northern Thailand within a strict 6-month government mandate.
telecom-infrastructure.solution: Designed a hybrid network using optical ground wire (OPGW) and high-capacity microwave links to traverse difficult mountainous terrain.
telecom-infrastructure.result: Successfully connected 15,000 households and 20 schools to gigabit internet ahead of schedule.
